Name: Deadburg
About the game: The Xbox 360 Indie hit is now coming to PC! Deadburg is a co-op survival game set in a procedurally generated city with thousands of buildings to explore and zombies to kill. Every building you see can be explored, exploited and destroyed one block at a time. Play alone or with friends and discover the secrets of the city while you craft items, find supplies and learn new skills. FEATURES WORLD - A large procedurally generated city awaits you, filled with zombies and loot. Every block can be broken, you can build a building or raze one to the ground. MULTIPLAYER - Play alone or with up to 3 friends. GAME MODES - Multiple game modes to tailor your zombie survival experience. DIFFICULTIES - Multiple difficulties to make the zombies more threatening if you feel you're up to it. CRAFTING - Craft weapons and supplies to utilize against the zombie menace. BASE BUILDING - Build a 100% custom building, or modify an existing structure. Full terrain editing means you can make whatever base you want. CHARACTER - As you survive your character will become stronger, unlocking additional bonuses and skills. GAME MODES SURVIVAL - The base survival game. Kill zombies, scavenge loot, craft weapons, build a base. DEFENSE - Surviving just got a little harder. The horde will come for you, best you be prepared. LAST LIFE - Survival means little if there isn't a penalty for death. If your character dies in Last Life it's game over. CREATIVE - Don't like the city? Want to make some changes? Creative mode allows you to modify an existing city and then convert it into another game mode.
